attributes.action: Scrap the Extradition treaty between the USA & UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is an unacceptable surrender of our rights and the US should have to satisfy our courts before removing citizens from the UK. If this stays it will be meaningless to the UK as the US will still go through the Department of Justice, the courts and a grand jury.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
